name: micro-frontend-system
description: Banking Micro-Frontend System with Vue 3 and Angular Module Federation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:first" "npm run dev:second"
scripts.build: npm run build:first && npm run build:second && npm run build:angular && npm run build:host
scripts.install:all: cd hostapp && pnpm install && cd ../firstapp && pnpm install && cd ../secondapp && pnpm install && cd ../angularapp && npm install
